hz_shaped_glyph_t
typedef struct
hz_shaped_glyph_t

Shaped glyph structure with all necessary information for layout & drawing.

hz_shape
HZ_API void hz_shape(
hz_font_t *font,
hz_sequence_t *sequence,
const hz_feature_t *features,
unsigned int num_features
)

Shapes a text sequence to positioned glyphs. If features is NULL, then default features are loaded for the sequence's script.

Arguments
font
hz_font_t*

Pointer to the font.

sequence
hz_sequence_t*

Pointer to sequence with loaded text.

features
const hz_feature_t*

Array of features to apply.

num_features
unsigned int

Number of features.
